column4: guys... i've just installed an application and i want to place a short in Applications>Other and i want this application to be ran as root. how do i do that? please help.

though you should learn this by messing around i will tell you, right click on the start-menu, and click edit-menus, go to other section "add a new item", select the command for it which should be ("gksudo app_name", eg gksudo gedit), and than select a relevant icon, and click ok, put the check mark on, and it will appear in the relevant section
i got it!!! thanks!!! when u say start-menu... u meant the menu bar... thanks!
